languages.text: {n}Хладные торговцы обмениваются молниеносными взглядами. По лицам видно, что слова угодили в нужную точку. Но гляделки пресекает властный и слегка раздраженный жест Пощады.{/n}

{n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хладные торговцы обмениваются молниеносными взглядами. По лицам видно, что слова угодили в нужную точку. Но гляделки пресекает властный и слегка раздраженный жест Пощады.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

{n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

{n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

{n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

languages.text: {n}冷市商人们互相交换着颜色。从他们的表情可以看出，婕伊的话说中了他们最关心的事情。然而，悯慈做了个傲慢而略带恼怒的手势，结束了这场无声的对话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冷市商人们互相交换着颜色。从他们的表情可以看出，婕伊的话说中了他们最关心的事情。然而，悯慈做了个傲慢而略带恼怒的手势，结束了这场无声的对话。{/n}

languages.text: {n}コールド・トレーダーたちの視線が互いに飛び交う。彼らの表情から、ジェイの言葉が的を射ていることがわかる。しかし、マーシーの不遜で少し苛立ったような身振りが、静かな会話に終止符を打つ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コールド・トレーダーたちの視線が互いに飛び交う。彼らの表情から、ジェイの言葉が的を射ていることがわかる。しかし、マーシーの不遜で少し苛立ったような身振りが、静かな会話に終止符を打つ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Comerciantes Fríos se miran entre ellos. A juzgar por sus caras, Jae ha dado en el clavo. Sin embargo, un gesto imperioso y ligeramente irritado de Mercy pone fin a la frenética conversación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Comerciantes Fríos se miran entre ellos. A juzgar por sus caras, Jae ha dado en el clavo. Sin embargo, un gesto imperioso y ligeramente irritado de Mercy pone fin a la frenética conversación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les marchands dans l'assemblée échangent des regards. Vous voyez sur leur visage qu'ils ne sont pas insensibles aux paroles de Jae, mais Mercy fait taire leur conversation silencieuse d'un geste impérieux et légèrement irrité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les marchands dans l'assemblée échangent des regards. Vous voyez sur leur visage qu'ils ne sont pas insensibles aux paroles de Jae, mais Mercy fait taire leur conversation silencieuse d'un geste impérieux et légèrement irrité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kalthändler tauschen hastig Blicke aus. Du erkennst in ihren Gesichtern, dass Jae mit ihren Worten ins Schwarze getroffen hat. Die still geführte Unterhaltung wird jedoch durch eine herrische und leicht irritierte Geste von Mercy beendet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kalthändler tauschen hastig Blicke aus. Du erkennst in ihren Gesichtern, dass Jae mit ihren Worten ins Schwarze getroffen hat. Die still geführte Unterhaltung wird jedoch durch eine herrische und leicht irritierte Geste von Mercy beendet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soğuk Tacirler birbirlerine bakıyor. Jae'ın sözlerinin hedefini bulduğunu görebiliyorsun. Ancak Merhamet'in buyurgan ve biraz da irite olmuş el hareketi, bu sessiz sohbeti sonlandırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders' eyes dart to each other. You can tell by their faces that Jae's words have hit their mark. But an imperious and slightly irritated gesture from Mercy brings the silent flurry of conversation to an end.{/n}
